content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":31641,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス君。一緒にいこ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-kun. Shall we go together?"},{"lineNumber":31642,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだ、魔人になるのがいいかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, maybe it's best to become a demon lord.\""},{"lineNumber":31643,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………そうだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":31644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":31645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だめ、っ……ランスは……ランスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No... Lance is... Lance is,"},{"lineNumber":31646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラの使徒……だろう、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satela's apostle... right...?\""},{"lineNumber":31647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……だから、だめ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why... that's why, no...\""},{"lineNumber":31648,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":31649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぅぁっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uah...!\""},{"lineNumber":31650,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひと睨み。","translatedEnglishLine":"A glare."},{"lineNumber":31651,"originalJapaneseLine":"命令を口に出した訳でもなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without uttering an order,"},{"lineNumber":31652,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ一瞥をくれただけで、サテラの身体が縮こまる。","translatedEnglishLine":"just a single glance made Satela's body shrink."},{"lineNumber":31653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で……ランス君？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... Lance-kun?\""},{"lineNumber":31654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I refuse.\""},{"lineNumber":31655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":31656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":31657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっか……あんな事を……あんな真似をしたのに。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... even after all that... doing such things."},{"lineNumber":31658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が手を伸ばしたら拒むんだ……くす」","translatedEnglishLine":"You still reject me when I reach out... hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":31659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":31660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun."},{"lineNumber":31661,"originalJapaneseLine":"　健太郎くんは……私の魔人だよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro-kun is... my demon lord, isn't he?"},{"lineNumber":31662,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵じゃ……ないよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's not... an enemy, right?\""},{"lineNumber":31663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――――……うん。もちろん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"--------- ...Yeah. Of course.\""},{"lineNumber":31664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん…………美樹ちゃん……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun... Miki-chan...!\""},{"lineNumber":31665,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎は穏やかに、美樹の傍らに立った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro calmly stood by Miki's side."},{"lineNumber":31666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおいおい、どうする！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, hey, what will you do!"},{"lineNumber":31667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっ、この圧力……まともじゃないわい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, this pressure... it's not normal.\""},{"lineNumber":31668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。だから――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. That's why――――\""},{"lineNumber":31669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいよ、ランス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, Lance!\""},{"lineNumber":31670,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひらけごまーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Open Sesame---!\""},{"lineNumber":31671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なに…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What...?"},{"lineNumber":31672,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹の背後で、ばっくりと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Behind Miki, wide open,"},{"lineNumber":31673,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブレイブ号の入口が開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Brave's entrance opened."},{"lineNumber":31674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いきなり全力ランスアッターーーーーーック！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suddenly, full power Lance attaaaaaack!\""},

{"lineNumber":31675,"originalJapaneseLine":"風に撫でられた、とでもいうような態で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Like being brushed by the wind,"},

{"lineNumber":31676,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王は扉の向こう……地底の空洞に降り立った。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Demon Lord landed beyond the door... in the underground hollow."},

{"lineNumber":31677,"originalJapaneseLine":"先は行き止まり。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahead was a dead end."},

{"lineNumber":31678,"originalJapaneseLine":"ブレイブ号は僅かに後退しており、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave had slightly retreated,"},

{"lineNumber":31679,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に掘った空間が開いているだけだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"only the already dug space was open."},

{"lineNumber":31680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、美樹ちゃーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Miki-chaaan!\""},

{"lineNumber":31681,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、どうだ効いたか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, how about that, did it work!\""},

{"lineNumber":31682,"originalJapaneseLine":"追いかけた健太郎に続き、ランスも地底に降りる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Following Kentaro who chased after, Lance also descended underground."},

{"lineNumber":31683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラ、ランス様…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-sama...!\""},

{"lineNumber":31684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手筈通りだ。行け！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's as planned. Go!\""},

{"lineNumber":31685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、で、でも…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But...!\""},

{"lineNumber":31686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行けといったら行け！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I said go, so go!"},

{"lineNumber":31687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足を引っ張るんじゃない、馬鹿奴隷！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't hold me back, you stupid slave!\""},

{"lineNumber":31688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……は、はい…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes...!\""},

{"lineNumber":31689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出すよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm launching!\""},

{"lineNumber":31690,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉を閉めたブレイブ号が、発進する。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Brave closed its doors and took off."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、魔人になるのがいいかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, maybe it's best to become a demon lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの使徒……だろう、っ……」
命令を口に出した訳でもなく、
ただ一瞥をくれただけで、サテラの身体が縮こまる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just a single glance made Satela's body shrink.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっか……あんな事を……あんな真似をしたのに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... even after all that... doing such things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が手を伸ばしたら拒むんだ……くす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You still reject me when I reach out... hehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎くんは……私の魔人だよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro-kun is... my demon lord, isn't he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は穏やかに、美樹の傍らに立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro calmly stood by Miki's side.
"Hey, hey, hey, what will you do!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、この圧力……まともじゃないわい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, this pressure... it's not normal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の背後で、ばっくりと、
ブレイブ号の入口が開いた。
「いきなり全力ランスアッターーーーーーック！」
風に撫でられた、とでもいうような態で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like being brushed by the wind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は扉の向こう……地底の空洞に降り立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Demon Lord landed beyond the door... in the underground hollow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブレイブ号は僅かに後退しており、
既に掘った空間が開いているだけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only the already dug space was open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、どうだ効いたか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, how about that, did it work!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけた健太郎に続き、ランスも地底に降りる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Kentaro who chased after, Lance also descended underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足を引っ張るんじゃない、馬鹿奴隷！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't hold me back, you stupid slave!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 扉を閉めたブレイブ号が、発進する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Brave closed its doors and took off.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
